Which of the following is true of the linear momentum of the bob as it swings from its highest to lowest point?

choices.label: It remains constant because momentum is always conserved.
It increases in magnitude and changes direction.
It decreases in magnitude and does not change direction.
It is converted to angular momentum.

content.answer: It increases in magnitude and changes direction.
